Articles.Content:
In the map view:

- Include HUD to see how much fuel remains for current stage
- Include possibility to stage the rocket
- While modyfying maneuver show AP/PE/ASC/DESC values without need of moving mouse above these points
- If the view is switched to map view for the first time the nav should be visible. Otherwise the control over the ship can be lost very easily. Edited November 17, 2015 by fisfis
